chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Type
X: Type

Goal:
forall S : Ensemble partial_injection, chain partial_injection_ord S -> exists x : partial_injection, forall y : partial_injection, In S y -> partial_injection_ord y x

Premises:
Record partial_injection_ord (pi1 pi2 : partial_injection) : Prop := Build_partial_injection_ord { pi_dom_inc : Included (pi_dom pi1) (pi_dom pi2); pi_func_ext : forall (x : X) (i1 : In (pi_dom pi1) x) (i2 : In (pi_dom pi2) x), pi_func pi1 x i1 = pi_func pi2 x i2 } Arguments Build_partial_injection_ord _ _ _ _%function_scope
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Ensemble _%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
chain = fun (T : Type) (R : relation T) (S : Ensemble T) => forall x y : T, In S x -> In S y -> R x y \/ R y x : forall T : Type, relation T -> Ensemble T -> Prop Arguments chain {T}%type_scope
In = fun (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U) (x : U) => A x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop Arguments In {U}%type_scope
Record partial_injection : Type := Build_partial_injection { pi_dom : Ensemble X; pi_func : forall x : X, In pi_dom x -> Y; pi_inj : forall (x1 x2 : X) (i1 : In pi_dom x1) (i2 : In pi_dom x2), pi_func x1 i1 = pi_func x2 i2 -> x1 = x2 } Arguments Build_partial_injection _ (_ _)%function_scope
pi_dom_inc : forall pi1 pi2 : partial_injection, partial_injection_ord pi1 pi2 -> Included (pi_dom pi1) (pi_dom pi2)
ZornsLemma : forall R : relation ?T, order R -> (forall S : Ensemble ?T, chain R S -> exists x : ?T, forall y : ?T, In S y -> R y x) -> exists x : ?T, maximal R x where ?T : [X : Type Y : Type |- Type]
ZornsLemmaForPreorders : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T), preorder R -> (forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) -> exists x : T, premaximal R x
pi_func_ext : forall pi1 pi2 : partial_injection, partial_injection_ord pi1 pi2 -> forall (x : X) (i1 : In (pi_dom pi1) x) (i2 : In (pi_dom pi2) x), pi_func pi1 x i1 = pi_func pi2 x i2
Build_partial_injection_ord : forall pi1 pi2 : partial_injection, Included (pi_dom pi1) (pi_dom pi2) -> (forall (x : X) (i1 : In (pi_dom pi1) x) (i2 : In (pi_dom pi2) x), pi_func pi1 x i1 = pi_func pi2 x i2) -> partial_injection_ord pi1 pi2
chains_ord_exists : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T), order R -> (forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) -> forall x : chains T R, (forall x0 : T, exists y : T, R x0 y /\ x0 <> y) -> exists y : chains T R, chains_ord T R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : chains T R, chains_ord T R x z -> chains_ord T R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)
sup_intro : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (S : Ensemble T), Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) -> forall c : chain R S, In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) (proj1_sig (chain_sup S c))
tower_is_chain : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T), order R -> forall (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}), chain R (tower T R chain_sup inflation)
tower_sind : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (P : T -> SProp), (forall S : Ensemble T, Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) -> (forall x : T, In S x -> P x) -> forall c : chain R S, P (proj1_sig (chain_sup S c))) -> (forall x : T, In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) x -> P x -> P (proj1_sig (inflation x))) ->...-> P t
tower_ind : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (P : T -> Prop), (forall S : Ensemble T, Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) -> (forall x : T, In S x -> P x) -> forall c : chain R S, P (proj1_sig (chain_sup S c))) -> (forall x : T, In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) x -> P x -> P (proj1_sig (inflation x))) ->...-> P t
Inductive tower (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) : Ensemble T := sup_intro : forall S : Ensemble T, Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) ->...-> In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) (proj1_sig (inflation x)) Arguments tower _%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope Arguments sup_intro _%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope Arguments inflation_intro _%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope
ZL' : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T), order R -> (forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) -> (forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) -> False
inflation_intro : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (x : T), In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) x -> In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) (proj1_sig (inflation x))
FiniteTypes.Finite_ens_type : forall S : Ensemble ?X, Finite ?X S -> FiniteTypes.FiniteT {x : ?X | In S x} where ?X : [X : Type Y : Type |- Type]
Families.family_intersection_intro : forall (T : Type) (F : Families.Family T) (x : T), (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (Families.FamilyIntersection F) x
Families.FamilyIntersection_ind : forall (T : Type) (F : Families.Family T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, Families.FamilyIntersection F t -> P t
Families.FamilyIntersection_sind : forall (T : Type) (F : Families.Family T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, Families.FamilyIntersection F t -> P t
chains_sup : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (F : Ensemble (chains T R)), chain (chains_ord T R) F -> {U : chains T R | (forall S : chains T R, In F S -> chains_ord T R S U) /\ (forall T0 : chains T R, (forall S : chains T R, In F S -> chains_ord T R S T0) -> chains_ord T R U T0)}
Families.family_union_intro : forall (T : Type) (F : Families.Family T) (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> In (Families.FamilyUnion F) x
chains_sup_correct : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (F : Ensemble (chains T R)) (P : chain (chains_ord T R) F), let U := chains_sup_def T R F P in (forall S : chains T R, In F S -> chains_ord T R S U) /\ (forall T0 : chains T R, (forall S : chains T R, In F S -> chains_ord T R S T0) -> chains_ord T R U T0)
Inductive FamilyIntersection (T : Type) (F : Families.Family T) : Ensemble T := family_intersection_intro : forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (Families.FamilyIntersection F) x Arguments Families.FamilyIntersection [T]%type_scope Arguments Families.family_intersection_intro [T]%type_scope _ [x] _%function_scope
Families.FamilyUnion_sind : forall (T : Type) (F : Families.Family T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, Families.FamilyUnion F t -> P t
Families.FamilyUnion_ind : forall (T : Type) (F : Families.Family T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, Families.FamilyUnion F t -> P t
Inductive FamilyUnion (T : Type) (F : Families.Family T) : Ensemble T := family_union_intro : forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> In (Families.FamilyUnion F) x Arguments Families.FamilyUnion [T]%type_scope Arguments Families.family_union_intro [T]%type_scope
Im_inv : forall (X0 : Ensemble ?U) (f : ?U -> ?V) (y : ?V), In (Im X0 f) y -> exists x : ?U, In X0 x /\ f x = y where ?U : [X : Type Y : Type |- Type] ?V : [X : Type Y : Type |- Type]
choice : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), (forall x : A, exists y : B, R x y) -> exists f : A -> B, forall x : A, R x (f x)
Quotients.induced_function2arg : forall (A B C : Type) (R : relation A) (S : relation B) (f : A -> B -> C), equivalence R -> equivalence S -> (forall (a1 a2 : A) (b1 b2 : B), R a1 a2 -> S b1 b2 -> f a1 b1 = f a2 b2) -> Quotients.quotient R -> Quotients.quotient S -> C
surjective = fun (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) => forall y : Y, exists x : X, f x = y : forall X Y : Type, (X -> Y) -> Prop Arguments surjective {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope
Im_intro : forall (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (x : U), In X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> In (Im X f) y
Strict_inclusion_is_transitive_with_inclusion : forall (U : Type) (x y z : Ensemble U), Strict_Included x y -> Included y z -> Strict_Included x z
